muck.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: dirt, mud, or another sticky substance that makes something dirty
muck.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Come on, let’s wipe that muck off your face.
muck.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: waste matter from animals, sometimes put on land to make plants grow better
muck.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: special machinery for spreading muck onto the fields
muck.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: something that is unpleasant or of very bad quality
muck.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: How can you eat that muck? It looks disgusting.
I’m not surprised she left. He treated her like muck  (=very badly).
